mapper.sql: id, amount, branch_id, status, order_date, unpaid_balance, account_id, type
mapper.update: update master.dbo.invoice set amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, unpaid_balance = #{unpaidBalance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
